alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Manatee and south central Hillsborough Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 857 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Macdill Air Force Base, or 9 miles east of Downtown Saint Petersburg, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Ruskin, Parrish, Greater Sun Center, Little Manatee River State Park, Sun City Center, Wimauma and Gibsonton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee
